name: Clownscapades
description:
What is "Clownscapades"?

Clownscapades is a short horror game where you must collect a certain ammount of items to win! In this game, the story is that you (the player) received a surprise birthday party from your mother! But the clown she hired, something felt off about him... ever since then you started having these nightmares where you were in a sewer, and everytime you got caught something would happen to you in real life, well today's the day, you're finally gonna face your fears and head deep inside!

Little did you know that you would get trapped in that small little maze, with your only way out would be to free all twelve souls, which would just maybe kill the monster trapped inside... maybe

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • Shift - Run
  • Mouse - Look
  • F - Flashlight 
  • ESC - Pause
